channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

Flooding in North Carolina from Chantal's remnants forces dozens to flee homes
item.description: Officials in North Carolina say heavy rain and flooding from the remnants of Tropical Storm Chantal forced dozens of people to flee their homes

item.title: Man accused of beheading father and posting video of his severed head to stand trial
item.description: A Pennsylvania man accused of killing his father and posting a video of his severed head online faces trial Monday in the Philadelphia suburbs

item.title: Wall Street moves lower as Trump’s tariff deadline nears
item.description: Wall Street is moving lower as the Trump administration steps up pressure on trading partners to make deals before a Wednesday deadline
